13struct Loading {
14 View* view;
15};
16
17typedef struct {
18 IconAnimation* icon;
19} LoadingModel;
20
21static void loading_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* _model) {
22 LoadingModel* model = (LoadingModel*)_model;
23
24 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
25 canvas_draw_box(canvas, 0, 0, canvas_width(canvas), canvas_height(canvas));
26 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
27
28 uint8_t x = canvas_width(canvas) / 2 - 24 / 2;
29 uint8_t y = canvas_height(canvas) / 2 - 24 / 2;
30
31 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, x, y, &A_Loading_24);
32
33 canvas_draw_icon_animation(canvas, x, y, model->icon);
34}
35
36static bool loading_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context) {
37 UNUSED(event);
38 furi_assert(context);
39 return true;
40}
41
42static void loading_enter_callback(void* context) {
43 furi_assert(context);
44 Loading* instance = context;
45 LoadingModel* model = view_get_model(instance->view);
46 /* using Loading View in conjunction with several
47 * Stack View obligates to reassign
48 * Update callback, as it can be rewritten
49 */
50 view_tie_icon_animation(instance->view, model->icon);
51 icon_animation_start(model->icon);
52 view_commit_model(instance->view, false);
53}
54
55static void loading_exit_callback(void* context) {
56 furi_assert(context);
57 Loading* instance = context;
58 LoadingModel* model = view_get_model(instance->view);
59 icon_animation_stop(model->icon);
60 view_commit_model(instance->view, false);
61}
62
63Loading* loading_alloc(void) {
64 Loading* instance = malloc(sizeof(Loading));
65 instance->view = view_alloc();
66 view_allocate_model(instance->view, ViewModelTypeLocking, sizeof(LoadingModel));
67 LoadingModel* model = view_get_model(instance->view);
68 model->icon = icon_animation_alloc(&A_Loading_24);
69 view_tie_icon_animation(instance->view, model->icon);
70 view_commit_model(instance->view, false);
71
72 view_set_context(instance->view, instance);
73 view_set_draw_callback(instance->view, loading_draw_callback);
74 view_set_input_callback(instance->view, loading_input_callback);
75 view_set_enter_callback(instance->view, loading_enter_callback);
76 view_set_exit_callback(instance->view, loading_exit_callback);
77
78 return instance;
79}
80
81void loading_free(Loading* instance) {
82 LoadingModel* model = view_get_model(instance->view);
83 icon_animation_free(model->icon);
84 view_commit_model(instance->view, false);
85
86 furi_assert(instance);
87 view_free(instance->view);
88 free(instance);
89}
90
91View* loading_get_view(Loading* instance) {
92 furi_assert(instance);
93 furi_assert(instance->view);
94 return instance->view;
95}
